title: 那么快你们这些学生就要上学了
txt_content: 那么快你们这些学生就要上学了，真希望早点到寒假，这样就可以和我的好基友一起玩了！！！

replies.author: 你好大大
replies.txt_content: 是挺期待。。 不过楼主的确一手好水

replies.author: 青木源
replies.txt_content:
楼主水的完全没意义……
而且内容一致，小心进末地

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
无意义内容要删的 请楼主仔细阅读版规 在发帖 谢谢合作 【官方用语】





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."
